alert.note: Alert for Kings; Richmond (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:58PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR HUDSON...EASTERN PASSAIC...UNION...SOUTH CENTRAL BERGEN... ESSEX...RICHMOND AND KINGS COUNTIES... At 258 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from East Hanover to Colonia, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. These severe storms will be near... Orange and Caldwell around 310 PM EDT. Elizabeth and Bloomfield around 315 PM EDT. Newark and Todt Hill around 320 PM EDT. Paterson and Passaic around 325 PM EDT. The Verrazano Narrows Bridge and Bay Ridge around 330 PM EDT. Jersey City and Ridgewood around 335 PM EDT. Hoboken and Secaucus around 340 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
